tags.description: Restaurant has 3 piers, mooring is 'free' but you are expected to eat at the restaurant. Call Babis ahead of time to reserve. if there is a strong northerly mooring can be tricky but Babis will advise you.
tags.name: Porto Spilia
Calypso Restaurant, Kioni, Ithaca, Ionian sea
